thread.section_title: Ocean County Veterinary Hospital Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ocean County Veterinary Hospital | ocvh.com
thread.title: Doug
thread.title_full: Ocean County Veterinary Hospital reviewed by Doug

author: Doug
title: Doug
text: We brought our 9 yo Golden here for scoping, and subsequent LP tie-back surgery if necessary (which it was). Everyone at the facility was super nice, professional, and caring. We spoke to the surgeon on arrival in the morning. He explained the procedure in detail, answering all our questions, giving us all the time necessary to ensure we were confident in what was about to happen. The follow-up calls and visit were handled in a professional and friendly manner. I would highly recommend this facility to anyone needs specialty treatment for their pet.
